p: The cytotoxicity of R-(+)-limonene was a little higher than that described by Kpoviessi et al. (2014) but the difference (factor less than 2) may be explained by the general biological variability of cells in culture. Moreover, our study showed that 1-octanol and linalool (CC 50>100Î¼g/ml) had no cytotoxicity on CHO cells.
